definition: exercising caution or showing care or attention
details:
adjective
- exercising caution or showing care or attention
= example: exercising caution or showing care or attention
- unhurried and with care and dignity
= synonyms: deliberate, measured
- mindful of the future in spending money
= example: mindful of the future in spending money
= synonyms: thrifty
- cautiously attentive
= example: cautiously attentive
= synonyms: heedful
- full of cares or anxiety
= example: full of cares or anxiety
